title: Parser process metadata
description: Metadata about a document or its processing which has been generated or collated as a result of the Find Case Law parsing process.

court.title: Court
court.description: An FCL court identifier code. Must be one of the values in the [list of courts](https://github.com/nationalarchives/ds-caselaw-utils/blob/main/courts.md).

date.title: Date of document
date.description: The primary date of the document. Usually publication date, hand-down date, decision date or similar.

name.title: Name of document
name.description: The title of the document for indexing purposes. May be different from the exact text which appears in the document.

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: A list of attachments to the document.

error-messages.title: Error messages
error-messages.description: A list of error messages raised whilst parsing this document.

primary_source.title: Primary source file
primary_source.description: Information about the primary source file which was parsed. This should usually be describing a document file such as a `.docx` or a `.pdf`, and not a container format such as `.zip`.

filename.name: Filename
filename.description: The filename (including extension) of the file which was parsed.

sha256.name: SHA256 hash
sha256.description: The SHA256 hash of the file.

mimetype.name: MIME type
mimetype.description: The MIME type of the file.

route.name: Route
route.description: The route which the file took to reach the parser.

metadata_fields.title: Metadata fields
metadata_fields.description: A list of additional metadata fields, either extracted from the document or sourced from a supplementary file.

id.title: Identifier
id.description:
A UUID for this piece of metadata.

A new UUID should be generated only if the metadata value has changed; if there is an existing piece of metadata with the same source and same value the existing `id` should be used.

name.title: Metadata name
name.description: The name of this piece of metadata

value.title: Metadata value
value.description: A value for this metadata. May be either a plain string, or a JSON object with additional complexity.

source.title: Metadata source
source.description: The origin of this piece of metadata.

timestamp.title: Timestamp of metadata creation
timestamp.description: The timestamp this piece of metadata was first detected or added.

parent.title: Category parent
parent.description: If this is a subcategory, the name of the parent category

xml_contains_document_text.name: XML contains document text
xml_contains_document_text.description: An indicator of if the XML of the document contains body text which is renderable for human consumption, instead of only being a stub containing metadata for a static asset.
